{{Infobox person | name = Matt Evers | image =Denise_Welch_and_Matt_Evers.jpg | caption = Evers and [[Denise Welch]] on the ''Dancing on Ice'' tour in 2011 | image_size = 240px | birth_name = Matt Evers | birth_date = {{birth date and age|1976|03|16}} | birth_place = [[Saint Paul, Minnesota|Saint Paul]], [[Minnesota]], [[United States]] | death_date = | death_place = | othername = | yearsactive = | spouse = | website = http://www.mattevers.com/ }} '''Matt Evers''' (born 16 March 1976) is an [[United States|American]] [[Pair skating|pair skater]], model and TV personality. ==Career== With his partner Heather Allebach, Evers won the Junior [[pair skating|pairs]] title at the [[1998 United States Figure Skating Championships|1998 U.S. Championships]].http://www.pairsonice.net/record.php?f=Allebach&m=Evers Evers is currently training as a professional actor, model and spokesperson for U.S. and European manufacturers at trade shows, in commercials and print media.[http://www.mattevers.com/ Matt Evers | The Official Website | Thanking You For All The Support!] ===Results=== Pair skating with Allebach: {| class="wikitable" |- ! Event ! 1997 ! 1998 |- | [[United States Figure Skating Championships|U.S. Championships]] || align="center" | 9th J. || align="center" bgcolor="gold" | 1st J. |} ===Dancing On Ice=== Evers has also appeared in all 6 series of ''[[Dancing on Ice (UK)|Dancing on Ice]]'' partnering [[Bonnie Langford]] (where they were placed 3rd place), [[Lisa Scott-Lee]], [[Suzanne Shaw]] where they won the competition in 2008 beating [[Chris Fountain]] and [[Frankie Poultney]] in the final 2. In the final, both of their performances scored the perfect 30 out of 30 which was a Dancing on Ice first and judge [[Nicky Slater]] said 'they were his champions and they deserved to win on the night'. During previous weeks the couple had received controversial comments from Nicky himself. In 2009 he partnered [[ZÃ¶e Salmon]] and they were popular with the public and judges but they were eliminated in the Skate-off against [[Jessica Taylor (Liberty X)|Jessica Taylor]] and [[Pavel Aubrecht]]. In the 5th series of ''Dancing on Ice'', Matt's partner was [[Heather Mills]]. Alas, they were eliminated on the 5th week, losing out to [[Kieron Richardson]]. For the 6th series of the show, Matt is partnered with [[Denise Welch]]. ===Personal life=== Evers has been dating fellow professional ice-dancer [[Kristina Lenko]] since October 2008. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !! Title !! Role !!
